addfeed: !addfeed <feed_name> <URL> - Admin only: Add an RSS feed to this channel.
removefeed: !removefeed <feed_name> - Admin only: Remove an RSS feed from this channel.
listfeeds: !listfeeds - List RSS feeds for this channel.
latest: !latest <feed_name> - Show the latest entry (title and link) for the specified feed.
setinterval: !setinterval <minutes> - Admin only: Set feed check interval for this channel.
reloadconfig: !reloadconfig - Admin only: Reload configuration and persistent data.
stats: !stats - Show usage statistics (number of feeds, subscriptions, etc.).
quit: !quit - Admin only: Disconnect the bot gracefully.
help: !help [command] - Show help (if a command is specified, show detailed help for that command).
search: !search <query> - Search the web for RSS feeds matching the query and display the top 5 results.
